HR and Admin Officer Job at Matrix Design and Works




        
    

        
        Matrix Design and Works is an indegineous furniture manufacturing company in kitchen cabinets, wardrobes, doors and office furnitures. Located at No 12, Miracle Avenue, Sangotedo Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR and Admin Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Employee Engagement: Measure the level of employee satisfaction, motivation, and commitment within the organization through surveys, feedback, and other engagement indicators.
	Recruitment and Selection: Monitor the effectiveness and efficiency of the recruitment and selection process, including time-to-fill positions, quality of hires, and cost per hire.
	Training and Development: Track the number of employees participating in training programs, their skill development progress, and the impact of training initiatives on employee performance.
	Employee Retention: Measure employee turnover rate, identify reasons for attrition, and develop strategies to improve employee retention.
	Performance Management: Assess the implementation and effectiveness of performance management systems, including goal setting, performance reviews, and feedback mechanisms.
	Compliance: Monitor HR and administrative compliance with legal requirements, industry regulations, and internal policies.
	HR Metrics: Track and analyze various HR metrics, such as absenteeism, time-to hire, turnover costs, training investment, and HR-related expenses.
	HR Process Efficiency: Evaluate the efficiency of HR processes, such as onboarding, payroll administration, benefits administration, and record keeping, by monitoring process timelines and accuracy.
	Employee Relations: Measure employee satisfaction with workplace relationships, communication channels, conflict resolution, and the effectiveness of employee feedback mechanisms.
	Cost Management: Monitor HR and administrative costs, including budget adherence, cost per employee, and cost reduction initiatives.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / BA or BSc Degree with 3-5 years of work experience. 


Salary
N250,000 - N350,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrmatrix001@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Marketing Officer",
  "description": "Radisson Onyx Hotel - Unwinding in paradise at this hotel. We offer the perfect blend of luxury and relaxation. With us, you will get only pure high-class treatment. A hotel stay is not just about the room, it&rsquo;s about the experience, creating memories that will last a lifetime at this hotel where luxury meets paradise.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Awka, Anambra

Job Brief


	If you live and breathe digital marketing, we want to talk to you. We are looking for a Digital Marketingto develop, implement, track and optimize our digital marketing campaigns across all digital channels.
	You should have a strong grasp of current marketing tools and strategies and be able to lead integrated digital marketing campaigns from concept to execution.
	Digital marketing managers will work with themarketing team, supporting teams (such as programmers), and vendors to launch campaigns on time and on budget.


Responsibilities


	Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns
	Design, build and maintain our social media presence
	Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)
	Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights
	Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies
	Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests
	Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience
	Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points
	Instrument conversion points and optimize user funnels
	Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners
	Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate


Requirements and Skills


	BS/MS degree in marketing or a related field
	Proven working experience in digital marketing
	Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and/or display advertising campaigns
	Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate
	Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels
	Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments
	Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends)
	Working knowledge of ad serving tools (e.g., DART, Atlas)
	Experience in setting up and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns
	Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints
